discussion_comments.comment_body: Let's remove the "embeddingPrefixes" from the JSON in the docs here. I know it's correct, but it ends up looking very complicated for a beginner setup. The way that we will solve this for all users going forward is by having the blocks on hub.continue.dev include the necessary embedding prefixes and then suggest in the docs that users use `uses: ollama/nomic-embed-text` for example

discussion_comments.comment_body: One last piece of feedback: since llama.cpp is more difficult to set up than other providers, I don't think we want to include it on the main page for `reranking.mdx`. Instead, could we move this new section to `docs/docs/customize/model-providers/more/llamacpp.mdx`?
